metadata.title: CVE-2023-50387 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: KeyTrap - Extreme CPU consumption in DNSSEC validator

criterions.comment: bind9 package in esm-infra/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
isc-dhcp package in esm-infra/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
unbound package in esm-infra/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
dnsmasq package in esm-infra/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
pdns-recursor: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
